name: Bulletguy Fever
description:
A rage platformer game created for the Gdevelop Game Jam! In this game your a guy who can shoot bullets. But there's a catch... You can ride them! 

  • A to move left
  • D to move right
  • Space to jump
  • Left Click to shoot

There is also an Ammo Bar on the top of the game screen. You can't shoot without ammo! SO you have to collect Ammo boxes to shoot again.
